article_title: Firefighters Called to Church's Chicken on 8th St.
article_text:
The Meridian Fire Department responded to Church's Chicken on 8th Street around 11:30 Friday night.

When firefighters arrived at the restaurant there were flames showing inside the back room of the building. Employees working at the time of the fire got out safely. Firefighters could be seen bringing out items that were on fire and stomping them out. No one was injured during the incident. Church's was back up and running on Saturday.
